    Currently, we're in the process of establishing our first local groups. If you're interested in starting a Distributed Chaos group in your area, check out our framework and get in touch!

    Start a Group

    Starting a local group is easy:

    1. Read our framework principles
    2. Join our GitHub organization
    3. Submit a pull request to add your group here
